commandDescription: creates new custom metadata type records from a CSV
commandLongDescription: Creates new custom metadata type records from a CSV.
filepathFlagLongDescription: The path to the CSV file.
inputDirectoryFlagDescription: directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from
inputDirectoryFlagLongDescription: The directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from.
outputDirectoryFlagDescription: directory where the file will be created
outputDirectoryFlagLongDescription: The directory where the file will be created.
typenameFlagDescription: API name of the custom metadata type
typenameFlagLongDescription: The API Name of the custom metadata type.
namecolumnFlagDescription: column that is used to determine the name of the record
namecolumnFlagLongDescription: The column that is used to determine the name of the record.
successResponse: Created custom metadata type records from '%s' at '%s'.
fieldNotFoundError: The column %s is not found on the custom metadata type %s
